name: vehicles
description: This table contains all vehicles listed for sale on the fictional sellmycar.com website.

columns.name: production_year
columns.description: Year when the vehicle was produced.

columns.name: number_of_seats
columns.description: Number of seats in the vehicle.

columns.name: cargo_volume
columns.description: Cargo volume of the vehicle in cubic meters.

columns.name: has_damages
columns.description: Whether the vehicle has any damages.
